author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a new study exploring why humans and some other animals can't produce Vitamin C
Links:
https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2025.07.22.666193v1.full.pdf
#biology #parasite #vitaminc

0:00 James Lind story 
2:10 Ascorbic acid and what it does 
2:50 Why can't we make vitamin C? 
3:40 How most animals make it 
5:10 Animals without vitamin c production - but why?  
6:50 Is it because of parasites? 
7:50 Experiment testing this hypothesis 
9:00 Major discoveries 
10:00 How does this work? 
11:00 What does this mean and what are the implications? 

Enjoy and please
title: Surprising Reason Why Humans Can't Produce Vitamin C Anymore
